医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员确定了多发性硬化症患者的关键蛋白质生物标志物，为个性化治疗策略铺平了道路研究人员旨在确定多发性硬化症 (MS) 的可靠蛋白质生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Researchers-identify-key- Protein-biomarkers-in-MS-患者-paving-way-for-personalized-treatment-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Researchers-identify-key- Protein-biomarkers-in-MS-患者-paving-way-for-personalized-treatment-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dc7fda8-9fd8-420b-8e9a-b0e58c55678d Wed, 01 Nov 2023 06:01:00 -0400 Researchers identify key protein biomarkers in MS patients, paving way for personalized treatment strategies
从细胞到药物：细胞绘画如何改变药物发现在本次采访中，Jordi Carreras 深入探讨了细胞绘画的迷人世界，这是一项在药物发现领域不断发展的强大技术。他分享了他的开创性研究、Phenaros 药物发现平台的独特之处以及学术界和工业界之间的协同作用的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/From-Cells-to-Drugs-How-Cell-Painting-is-Transforming-Drug-Discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/From-Cells-to-Drugs-How-Cell-Painting-is-Transforming-Drug-Discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d461304-4ae6-47c9-bbba-70da93d38d3f Wed, 01 Nov 2023 05:52:00 -0400 From Cells to Drugs: How Cell Painting is Transforming Drug Discovery
谷物研究的进展揭示了临床环境中精准营养的潜力谷物是饮食中能量（卡路里）的主要来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Advances-in-grain-research-Illuminate-potial-for- precision-nutrition-in-clinical-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Advances-in-grain-research-Illuminate-pottial-for- precision-nutrition-in-clinical-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7af741a6-f582-494d-8ae7-761e3cbdd85e Wed, 01 Nov 2023 05:15:00 -0400 Advances in grain research illuminate potential for precision nutrition in clinical settings
甜蜜的真相：黑加仑和柑橘提取物有助于预防 2 型糖尿病吗？在最近的一项研究中，欧洲研究人员发现黑加仑 (BC) 提取物可以在饭后立即降低血糖水平，但剂量越高并不更有效，而且水果纤维也不会增强效果。尽管存在局限性，该研究为研究控制 2 型糖尿病和血糖水平的饮食干预措施提供了新的方向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Sweet-truths-Could-blackcurrant-and-citrus-extracts-help-prevent-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Sweet-truths-Could-blackcurrant-and-citrus-extracts-help-prevent-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=820d4895-d3fa-454a-be7b-e99c0e0ac6e4 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 00:00:00 -0400 Sweet truths: Could blackcurrant and citrus extracts help prevent type 2 diabetes?
对身体活动的积极态度与降低衰老焦虑有关自2011年以来，美国每天约有10,000人年满65岁。婴儿潮一代和 1946 年之前出生的人构成了美国增长最快的年龄段，到 2035 年，这一群体的人数有望超过儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Positivity-about-physical-activity-linked-to-lower-aging-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Positivity-about-physical-activity-linked-to-lower-aging-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb060a73-6896-4196-9e71-d55525e29cd4 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 23:56:35 -0400 Positivity about physical activity linked to lower aging anxiety
新的床边心脏评估课程侧重于以患者为中心的学习床边心脏评估 (BCA) 包括收集患者的病史、进行体检以及确定是否需要进行诊断测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-bedside-cardiac-assessment-curriculum-focuses-on-patent-centered-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/New-bedside-cardiac-assessment-curriculum-focuses-on-patent-centered-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9aff0f2d-148e-412a-aa1d-91b7008fcf07 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 23:48:54 -0400 New bedside cardiac assessment curriculum focuses on patient-centered learning
早期痴呆症患者可能受益于太极拳，但需要进一步研究最近的系统综述发现，太极拳能够延缓痴呆或改善患有轻度认知障碍的成年人的认知功能的能力尚无定论。该研究呼吁进行更稳健、大规模的研究，以阐明太极拳的神经学益处及其作为 MCI 干预措施的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Early-stage-dementia-患者-may-benefit-from-Tai-Chi-but-further-research-is-required.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Early-stage-dementia-病人-may-benefit-from-Tai-Chi-but-further-research-is-required.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d72f6b37-a64f-45cc-adb0-760e212d53e2 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 23:30:00 -0400 Early-stage dementia patients may benefit from Tai Chi, but further research is required
研究人员开发出新方法来绘制大脑各部分如何相互“说话”的图谱由克利夫兰诊所和俄勒冈健康与科学大学 (OHSU) 领导的研究小组开发了一种新方法，用于绘制大脑各部分如何相互“说话”的图谱，这对于了解神经系统疾病患者的行为变化至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Researchers-develop-new-method-for-mapping-how-the-parts-of-the-brain-speak-to-each-other.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Researchers-develop-new-method-for-mapping-how-the-parts-of-the-brain-speak-to-each-other.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d3fe6e5-9722-4fd1-ba5a-d5304811da65 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 23:05:28 -0400 Researchers develop new method for mapping how the parts of the brain "speak" to each other
UTA生物学教授获得NIH资助用于新型超分辨率显微镜UTA 很快将在其已经令人印象深刻且不断发展的研究装备中添加一台新的尖端设备——一种超分辨率显微镜 (SRM)，可以让生物学家更详细地观察细胞内的结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/UTA-biology-professor-awarded-NIH-grant-for-new-super-resolution-microscope.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/UTA-biology-professor-awarded-NIH-grant-for-new-super-resolution-microscope.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35221e2e-975d-4fca-8b62-b685f063952e Tue, 31 Oct 2023 23:01:44 -0400 UTA biology professor awarded NIH grant for new super-resolution microscope
研究表明，在肉类选择上使用警告标签可以改善公众健康根据今天（11 月 1 日）发布的新研究，香烟风格的图形警告标签可以减少人们的肉类消费。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Use-of-warning-labels-on-meat-options-could-improve-public-health-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Use-of-warning-labels-on-meat-options-could-improve-public-health-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffa1af04-c18e-4e19-839f-b339ecd6a1eb Tue, 31 Oct 2023 22:58:39 -0400 Use of warning labels on meat options could improve public health, study suggests
